venue.name: Hess Gas - Intersection Mass Pike, Rt 128, and Commonwealth Ave

item.description:
This is an impromptu ride that stems from Chuck's idea for a ride on Sunday.
The weather will be a bit cool, but very doable, so dress appropriately.
We will head west toward the Quabbin Reservoir, check out the sites, stop to get a bite to eat and then head back east.
There is no set agenda and we will do as we decide at the time. Bring a camera.
item.how_to_find_us: Be in front to the side of the front entrance.
item.name: Quabbin Reservoir
